archimate:Requirement.name: SOGP Statement
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
This is an example of an SOGP Statement. This element's only purpose is to aid explaining the modelling structure in the view where it has been placed. An SOGP Statement may be realized by one or more Control Measures or, in some cases, none at all.
Its numbering format is two letters, followed by three numbers separated by dots. This is an example SOGP Statement. It's only purpose is to aid explaining the modelling structure in the view where it has been placed. An SOGP statement may be realized by one or more Control Measures or in worst case, none at all.
